Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.cli

Class PrintUtils

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.cli.PrintUtils
public class PrintUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Support class for the CLI The functions allow console printing with colors and more ease of use
